effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 50% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

flavor_text.x_y: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.
